#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
long long sum,required,ans;
int left_[500005],right_[500005],l_cou,r_cou,num[500005];
int main()
{
    int n,i,j;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        scanf("%d",&num[i]);
    if(n<3)
    {
        printf("0\n");
        return 0;
    }
    sum=0;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        sum+=num[i];
    if(sum%3)
    {
        printf("0\n");
        return 0;
    }
    required=sum/3;
    l_cou=r_cou=0;
    //left
    sum=0;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        sum+=num[i];
        if(sum==required)
        {
            left_[l_cou++]=i;
        }
    }
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        if(sum==required)
        {
            right_[r_cou++]=i;
        }
        sum-=num[i];
    }
    ans=0;
    j=0;
    for(i=0;i<l_cou&&j<r_cou;)
    {
        if(left_[i]<(right_[j]-1))
        {
            ans+=(r_cou-j);
            i++;
        }
        else
            j++;
    }
    printf("%lld\n",ans);
    return 0;
}
